short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhancement features for going through your YT subscribed channels.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you're a professional YouTube viewer like me, you probably manually comb through your list of subscribed channels every day. This extension simplifies that process with enhancing features:

Auto scroll down to fully show the videos (ignoring the channel banner and stuff)
Shift+⬇️ (down arrow) to go to the next subscribed channel that has a new video
Auto click "Show [number] More" under the Subscriptions section.
Pause youtube channel autoplay video if there is one

I hope your life gets just that bit easier with this extension :)

*Update: YouTube updated its interface, so I had to update this extension.
